@staticmethod def get_job_status(job): """ Gets the status of a job.
:param job: The job to query. :return: The current status of the job. """ try: job.load() logger.info( "Job %s is performing action %s and has status %s.", job.id, job.action, job.status_code) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't get status for job %s.", job.id) raise else: return job.status_code
